mutants.code:
def calculate_minimum_wire_length(t, datasets):
    results = []
    for dataset in datasets:
        (n, k, x) = dataset
        x.sort()
        diff = []
        for i in range(1, len(x)):
            diff.append(x[i] - x[i - 1])
        diff.sort(reverse=True)
        s = sum(diff[:k - 1])
        min_wire_length = max(x) - min(x) + s
        results.append(min_wire_length)
    return results

def calculate_minimum_wire_length(t, datasets):
    results = []
    for dataset in datasets:
        (n, k, x) = dataset
        x.sort()
        diff = []
        for i in range(1, len(x)):
            diff.append(x[i] - x[i - 1])
        diff.sort(reverse=True)
        s = sum(diff[:k - 1])
        min_wire_length = (max(x) - min(x)) * s
        results.append(min_wire_length)
    return results
